overview: This film explores the mystery of what happened to businessman Alec Steenkamp, who was buried for eight years in the backyard of a house in Brixton. Steenkamp was murdered with a hammer and buried in a shallow grave. His family waited nine years for justice. Why did police not believe Andrea Steenkamp when she insisted her husband's murderer was none other than the police informant, Ken Downey?
title: A Shallow Grave
